tickets.title: CPF Balance Tracking and Storage
tickets.description: Create foundational CPF account balance tracking system for OA, SA, and MA accounts with data storage and retrieval, integrating as individual asset entries.
technicalDetails: Create CPF account balance data model with OA, SA, and MA account tracking using existing asset structure.
Implement API endpoints for CPF balance storage and retrieval integrated with existing assets API.
Add CPF balance input form in frontend allowing users to enter current balances for all three accounts.
Create 3 separate asset entries when user inputs CPF data: CPF Ordinary Account, CPF Special Account, CPF Medisave Account.
Use appropriate categorization ('retirement' category) and icons (üè¶) for CPF asset entries.
Ensure CPF accounts appear in Assets section alongside stocks, house, etc. as individual line items.
acceptanceCriteria: User can input current CPF OA, SA, MA balances through a dedicated form.
Each CPF account appears as separate asset entry in the Assets section (üè¶ CPF Ordinary Account, etc.).
CPF balances are stored using existing assets API structure and endpoints.
CPF accounts contribute to Total Assets and Net Worth calculations automatically.
CPF entries follow existing asset UI patterns (clickable, editable, same styling).
Balance data persists correctly and displays in the financial dashboard.

tickets.title: CPF Contribution Calculator
tickets.description: Implement CPF contribution calculation engine that auto-populates income and expense entries based on salary, but allows manual editing for flexibility.
technicalDetails: Create CPF contribution rate calculator with current rates (20% employee, 17% employer).
Implement age-based contribution rate adjustments following CPF guidelines.
Add salary band logic for contribution calculations with wage ceiling considerations (S$7,400 ceiling from Jan 1 2025, rising to S$8,000 on Jan 1 2026).
Auto-populate CPF employer contribution in Income section when user enters salary.
Auto-populate CPF employee contribution in Expenses section when user enters salary.
Allow manual editing of auto-populated CPF contribution amounts for user flexibility.
Show calculation basis (e.g., 'Based on $8,000 salary, age 32') in contribution entries.
Re-calculate when salary changes but preserve manual overrides if user has edited values.
acceptanceCriteria: When user enters salary, system automatically creates/updates CPF contribution entries in Income and Expenses.
CPF employer contribution appears as income line item (üè¶ CPF employer contribution $1,258 based on the S$7,400 ceiling and increases automatically when the cap rises).

CPF employee contribution appears as an income line item labelled as mandatory CPF savings (üè¶ CPF employee contribution $1,480 based on the S$7,400 ceiling and increases automatically when the cap rises).
Salary entries indicate whether the amount entered is gross or net, displaying Net Salary (after CPF) in the dashboard when applicable.
Contribution calculations follow current CPF rates and age-based adjustments.
User can manually edit auto-populated CPF amounts if needed.
Calculation basis is shown to user for transparency.
Salary changes trigger recalculation but respect manual user overrides.
CPF contributions integrate into existing Income/Expenses flow and contribute to Savings calculation.

tickets.title: CPF Interest and Balance Projections
tickets.description: Build CPF balance projection system with interest calculations and future balance forecasting.
technicalDetails: Integrate CPF interest calculation (2.5% for OA, 4% for SA/MA up to $60k, 5% above).
Add CPF balance projection calculator showing future balances at retirement age.
Implement compound interest calculations with monthly contribution additions.
Create projection timeline showing balance growth over years with contribution and interest components.
acceptanceCriteria: CPF projection shows realistic balance growth incorporating accurate interest rates.
Interest calculations properly handle different rates for OA vs SA/MA accounts.
Future balance projections account for continued contributions and compound growth.
Projection timeline clearly shows contribution vs interest growth components.

tickets.title: CPF Retirement Adequacy Checker
tickets.description: Build simple retirement readiness assessment showing whether user is on track for retirement based on CPF projections.
technicalDetails: Create retirement adequacy assessment engine using current CPF minimum sum requirements.
Implement binary status checker (on track / not on track) based on projected balances.
Add retirement age consideration (55, 62, 65) for different withdrawal scenarios.
Build simple dashboard indicator showing retirement readiness status with explanatory messaging.
acceptanceCriteria: User sees clear indication if current trajectory leads to retirement adequacy.
Assessment uses current CPF minimum sum requirements accurate as of 2024.
Retirement readiness status is clearly communicated with actionable insights.
Assessment considers different retirement age scenarios and withdrawal options.

tickets.title: HDB Housing Planner - Core Module
tickets.description: Enable Singapore users to compare housing options and plan down payments using CPF and cash, focusing on BTO vs resale decisions.
technicalDetails: Create HDB property comparison engine supporting BTO (new) vs resale options with realistic pricing.
Implement CPF OA usage calculator for property purchases (max 120% of property value for private, 100% + accrued interest for HDB).
Build down payment calculator factoring CPF OA available balance vs cash requirement (minimum 5% cash for HDB).
Add monthly mortgage affordability checker using MSR (30% for HDB loans) and TDSR (60% total debt) ratios.
Integrate HDB loan (2.6%) vs bank loan comparison with interest rate differential calculations.
Create property timeline planner showing BTO balloting to key collection timeline vs immediate resale purchase.
acceptanceCriteria: User can input target property price and see breakdown of CPF vs cash needed for down payment.
System accurately calculates maximum affordable property price based on income and existing debts.
BTO vs resale comparison shows total costs, timeline differences, and funding requirements.
Monthly mortgage payment calculation accounts for HDB vs bank loan options with current rates.
CPF OA usage scenarios show impact on retirement savings when used for property.
All calculations comply with current HDB and MAS regulations for property financing.

tickets.title: Basic Scenario Planning Engine
tickets.description: Create simple life stage scenario planning allowing users to model major life events and their financial impact over time.
technicalDetails: Design scenario template system with 3 key life stages: Single, Married, Family (with kids).
Create goal timeline visualization showing major milestones: housing, marriage, children, car, retirement.
Implement basic what-if calculator for major expense impact on savings and cash flow.
Build scenario comparison view showing side-by-side financial projections for different paths.
Add simple goal prioritization matrix (must-have, should-have, nice-to-have) based on financial capacity.
Create milestone tracking system showing progress toward each goal with target dates.
acceptanceCriteria: User can select life stage templates and see relevant financial goals automatically populated.
Goal timeline shows realistic target dates based on current financial position and savings rate.
What-if scenarios show impact of major purchases (house, car, wedding) on other financial goals.
User can adjust goal priorities and see updated timeline and required savings rates.
Scenario comparison clearly shows trade-offs between different life choices.
All scenarios factor in Singapore-specific costs (HDB, CPF, wedding costs, childcare).

tickets.description: Build comprehensive Singapore income tax calculator showing impact on take-home pay and optimization opportunities.
technicalDetails: Implement Singapore income tax calculation with progressive rates and standard reliefs (spouse, child, parent, etc.).
Create take-home pay calculator factoring CPF contributions (employee portion) and income tax.
Add tax relief optimizer suggesting maximum claimable reliefs for life insurance, CPF top-ups, course fees.
Build monthly cash flow projector showing net income after CPF and tax deductions.
Integrate with CPF module to show tax benefits of voluntary SA/MA top-ups.
Create year-end tax planning recommendations based on current income and relief claims.
acceptanceCriteria: Tax calculator accurately computes Singapore income tax using current rates and bands.
Take-home pay calculation matches official CPF and IRAS computation methods.
User sees optimization suggestions for tax reliefs based on their life situation (married, kids, elderly parents).
Monthly cash flow projections accurately reflect tax and CPF impact on disposable income.
CPF top-up tax benefits are clearly quantified and recommended where beneficial.
All tax calculations comply with current IRAS regulations and relief caps.

Implement CPF LIFE payout projector with inflation adjustment and different payout schemes.
